<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Soothing Tonic](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1965)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 60 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Soothing tonic is a pleasantly savory concoction that speeds your natural healing, so your wounds recover faster over time. You gain [fast healing](/Rules.aspx?ID=796) for 1 minute in an amount depending on the tonic's type.
